column1: RISE FROM THE ASHES    6    VOID    Touch    One target individual    Instantaneous    Everything that exists has a pattern in the Void
column2: a thread woven in the tapestry that is existence. By recalling the memory of that pattern
column3: you can reverse recent effects that have happened to a living creature. When you cast this spell on an individual
column4: you are essentially restoring their existence within the Void in accordance with their previous self. Upon completion of the spell
column5: the person is immediately restored to the state they were in eight hours prior to when the spell was begun. Any injuries suffered during this time
column6: the effects of diseases or poisons
column7: even the acquisition of supernatural conditions such as the Shadowlands Taint or corruption by the Lying Darkness
column8: can be undone in this manner. Upon the completion of this spell
column9: you lose all Void Points
column10: and you may not regain Void Points for a period of three days
column11: after which they will begin to recover at one Void Point per day until you have your maximum normal amount again. This spell cannot be used to restore someone who has died.
